name: Burning Pink
description: A work in progress... A tribute to TheSpook's original Smokin' Orange deviant art style. Dark shades of gray with radical pink highlights and links. This style is currently WIP and many bits still don't work properly.  Will be updated every time after the "orange" version update.
additional_info: A tribute to TheSpook's original Smokin' Orange deviant art style. Dark shades of gray with radical orange highlights and links. This style is currently WIP and many bits still don't work properly. Making the orange bits of this theme pink, I like it that way but it is not finished yet. Uploaded it to check what is already working and what is not.
